docblock.long-description:
The main hub of our login system

PHP version 5.2.17 or higher

LICENSE: TBD
Sets some basic settings for extra security Starts the session Checks last know ip to prevent hijacking
Returns the current path of the url
Returns the current page of the url
This generates a random salt to be used in a password hasing
This creates a hash of the selected password and uses a unique salt provided by genSalt function

tag.name: param
tag.description: The random salt for the password

docblock.long-description: For UIN and inital password Checks to make sure string is all numbers
This checks if the suppled password is equal to the current stored hashed password

Returns a login form that user can login with It then checks to see if the login is successful

If so create session and/or remember cookie
Check if the user is logged-in Check for session and/or cookie is set then reference it in the database to see if it is valid if so allow the user to login
Checks and sees if the session is set Similar to LoggedIn however it does not rediect the user
Resets Session and destroyes it, deletes any cookies and redirects to index
If the remember me feature is enabled and the user has selected it create a cookie for them. Log it in the database
Delete the users cookie
Logs users activity, Nothing personal.... just login times, logout times, when recover passwords have been activated All for security

tag.name: param
tag.description: What action is happening and needs logging

docblock.long-description: Loads all the member data
This function allows user to register
Creates a random string of A-Z0-9
Checks and sees if a verCode is present and that a user is try to reover a password, otherwise Lets the user Recover their password using e-mail
Chnages the selected users password
Chnages the selected users email
Delete user account
If email verification is set this handels those verifications
Creates the Admin Account on setup
